title: F/S 10 Card Hall of Famer Lot
author: lharri3600

posts.post_title: F/S 10 Card Hall of Famer Lot
posts.post_content:
Offering a 10 card hall of famer lot. Asking $600 or b/o. I'll cover shipping and insurance if lot sells for my asking price. All cards have technical issues. 
Lot includes the following cards:

Joe Kelly-Piedmont 350
Hughie Jennings (one hand) Piedmont 350 
Hughie Jennings (both hands) Sweet Caporal 350-460 overprint
Frank Chance (yellow portrait) Sweet Caporal 350
Rube Marquard (hands at side) Sweet Caporal 150 overprint
Johnny Evers (portrait) Sovereign 150
Jack Chesbro (portrait) Piedmont 150
Mordecai Brown (chicago shirt) Sweet Caporal 350
Nap Lajoie (portrait) Piedmont 150
John McGraw (portrait no cap) Sweet Caporal 150
